summary:
In many religions, God is seen as the most powerful being, often the creator of the universe. Some believe God is one supreme being, while others think there are many gods. People have different ideas about God; some see God as kind and watching over us, while others think God created everything but doesn't interfere.

God is often prayed to and worshipped. Some people believe knowing God is through faith, and some don't believe in God at all. God can be referred to in many ways, with different names and titles across various cultures.
title: God
